rules.summary: KL University has strict academic, conduct, hostel, and institutional rules that students must follow.

academic_conduct.attendance: A minimum of 85% attendance is mandatory for all courses to be eligible for semester-end examinations.
academic_conduct.evaluation: In-semester evaluations contribute a maximum of 50% to the total marks. Answer scripts are shown to students for verification.
academic_conduct.integrity: Students must maintain academic integrity and avoid malpractice in examinations.

code_of_conduct.discipline: Strict silence and discipline must be maintained in classrooms, laboratories, and academic areas.
code_of_conduct.prohibited: Ragging, smoking, alcohol consumption, and any form of indiscipline are strictly prohibited on campus.
code_of_conduct.dress_code: Students are required to wear the prescribed uniform and follow the official dress code.
